model.entity

Class Exit

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entity.Entity
      • model.entity.Exit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPawn, ISquare

    public class Exit
extends Entity
    The class exit that allow to create an object that can be used to end the game

    1.2
    Author:
    Luc Anthoni
